New Records: England avoided a new record-low T20 total
Key Match Events: Jason Holder took four wickets for seven runs, including two in two balls to finish with format-best figures
Chris Jordan top-scored for England with 28 from 23 balls
Brandon King's unbeaten 52 from 49 deliveries broke the back of the chase
Sheldon Cottrell took two wickets in two balls
Post-Match Reflections: England will have little time to lick their wounds, with the next match taking place on Sunday
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Windies are without the menacing presence of Chris Gayle at the top of the order
The match was played under floodlights with a Covid-reduced crowd
Others: Jason Roy set pulses racing with a 36-ball ton in England's only warm-up before missing a wild swipe and being dismissed
